attributes.action: provide the Learning and Skills Council (LSC) with money they require to build new institutions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The LSC have been careless in their approach to funding new colleges and schools being built in the UK.  However, with thousands of peoples jobs at risk due to the construciton work stopping, i ask the government to provide the required capital to keep the projects running, and people in jobs!
